com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo

Class VideoSurfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.VideoSurfaceView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class VideoSurfaceView
extends android.view.SurfaceView
    A SurfaceView implementation that resizes itself according to a specified aspect ratio.
